Some background on this one: I'm role-playing a Roland that loves women, sex, and trying to be funny. We had no luck with connecting to Sol until day 3, when Eleesha finally made the connection. We were desperate for morale, as a rampaging mush Derek killed Janice and Raluca, and our Chun is inactive.

NERONRebel networks: connection established Health implication: team morale boost.

RolandTHANK YOU ELEESHA!

Eleeshagot it

RolandThat earns you one free sex with myself.

Eleeshacome and get me baby!

RolandOh, you bet I would! Just have to find the appropriate time when there's no cameras around. You are now at the top of the list though. (sorry Hua and Paola)

Here's where Terrence (actually our second mush) chimes in

TerrenceLadies, I hear this virile patroller jockey likes it all natural. So just keep in mind that I always carry prophylactics when doing "repairs".

RolandRepairs? Are you implying that these women are not perfect the way they are? How very Chauvinistic of you grumpy old man. Any real woman knows I'm better au naturale anyways.

TerrenceWhoa. Is it getting hot in here or is it just me? I merely meant the restoration of morale when I said "repairs". It's geek speak. I can't help it! Surely the comms officer, Paola, can appreciate some techno-sweet-talk? Isn't that right my little chipadee?

RolandWhat a girl really wants is a man that can make her laugh, and I'm sure that's something I am far ahead of you in! Paola, you are too beautiful to be swooned by such a terribly grumpy old man! He can't even walk, how do you think he'd perform in the bedroom? I am the peak of physical perfection here! Women appreciate my humor more than you "geek speak" old man. Isn't that right beautiful ladies?

TerrenceGrumpy old men in wheel chairs learn to walk that third leg in ways you've never even dreamed of, son. Just sayin'.

RolandOh yeah? How do we know you can even get it up anymore? I bet that "third leg" you speak of is more of a "limp biscuit" than anything.

TerrenceYoung man, you just sound jealous now. Maybe we should arrange a mnage trois and exchange some field notes? Shall we invite Andie to spice things up?

RolandHm, I think I can accept that, on one condition: I don't catch, I pitch. I'm a shooter for a reason.

TerrenceLOL. Fair enough. As a technician I prefer to use my tool actively. Let's see who would like to play after we resolve our current crisis.

As you can see, I'm quite juvenile when playing as Roland, but I really enjoyed the back and forth with our grumpy Terrence. It was a shame when we had to kill him for being mush.

Janice : Open bed in bravo dorm.

Paola : Thank you thank you! Closed bed in Bravo Dorm

Stephen : Open bed here in Alpha.

Stephen : Would prefer a woman. I'm tired of sleeping with guys.

Terrence : I'm in Bravo dorm with three women.. heh..

Stephen : I'm going to break your le...wheel.

Paola : Stephen, it's not fear for my legs (or what's between them) that keeps me out of Alpha dorm right now... but rather that I'm at 11 morale and Janice is here. She's probably even better company than you would be for me at this point! I need a shrink more than a snuggle.

Terrence : You may break my wheel, but you'll never break my harem!

Ian : Gasp!
Paola has stolen my Precatus!

Paola : Have you moved yet? I'd be happy to put it in rear corridor for you?

Ian : That'd be wonderful.

Paola : Watered it to try and let you store up a plant point - I'm already dirty.

Ian : Oh, thank you Paola, for watering my Precatus for me; I guess some plant-nappers are good people after all.

Paola : I only nabbed it for the plant's sake! I didn't know for sure you'd be picking it up this cycle!

Paola : I couldn't leave the room and leave the plant behind, just in case!

Terrence : I've got two banana plants and a graapshoot on me. I feel the botany overtaking my mind..

Ian : I guess we're going to have to be fighting against the Bush menace soon. Try not to get the vines stuck in your brain, or we'll have to build a PhytoScanner......

Terrence : I hope they don't spike us.. plant thorns are pretty painful...

Paola : IAN Ahem. We're all counting on you to keep these plants under some semblance of control. Just think, if we'd gotten hydropots when that project came up, instead of the extra drone.... we'd have 10 plants taking over!

Ian : It's too late for Terrence. After a closer examination via NERON's various cameras; Terrence is looking mighty withered right now....
He might die if we don't water him soon.

Terrence : Oh Space-Gods.. is there anything I can do? I don't want to wilt and die!

Paola : Quick! Finish Pilgred and lets all take turns pouring coffee on Terrence each cycle!

Stephen : We could just....You know.....Urinate on him.

Terrence : For the love of Space-Gods, I hope you let it cool down before you do that!

Paola : Hey Ian, isn't Terrence sounding like he feels better already?

Terrence : I can almost feel my legs again, that's how much better I am feeling.

Hua : should i start expo?

Stephen : Sure.

Terrence : Let me tag along!

Stephen : We have 6 people.

Terrence : Hell yeah. I call shotgun on the Icarus. And Stephen, we can team up on the expo. You wheel me around, I'll soak up the wonderful views.

Stephen : Ghost ridin' the crip!

Terrence : We gonna strut down the ghetto slums and show off the wheels, Stephen?

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: We landed Terrence keeps putting his arm on my arm rest.

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: We passed some ruins. While the others were looking around I was running Terrence off some sick jumps.

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: Stephen keeps hogging all the damn room! He keeps trying to use my wheelchair armrests too!

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: Stephen keeps looking at my notepad and pen, I reckon he's going to steal them, because I'm a much better record keeper than hi-

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: I just took Terrence's pen and pad and now i

Hua : wow 24x o2. need planet with fuel now?

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: Terrence punch me in the Paola joybringers.

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: I punched Stephen right in the family jewels as he was operating the oxygen pump. He fell over and dropped the pen and pad he stole. Time to high-wheel it out of there before he gets back up!

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: We found air....yawn

Stephen : Stephen's Note: Terrence is probably a Mush

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: We were going through some desert when I spotted some plants growing nearby.. I'm heading off to pick them up. Maybe Ian will know what they are! I hope nothing bad happens whilst I'm over there.

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: I chased after Possible Mush suspect Terrence into a large natural orchard. I didn't find him but I did find some fruits. Paola will be impressed.

Stephen : Stephen's Note: Anything Terrence says is a lie.

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log:I overheard Stephen rambling to himself about "they'll believe that.." and words like "mush" and "lies". Maybe Janice can diagnose him with schozophrenia or something.

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: 50 minutes more on this hellhole.

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: 50 more minutes of having my own private chef-uer. It's nice to be wheeled around for once. What a pleasant planet!

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: Me and Terrence spent some time trying to grab some food for the ship while trying to figure out Just what the hell is Andie?

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: Stephen managed to nab some small animals and practically gutted them on the spot, even carved some into pork sausages.. I was picking up some of the sausages and said to Stephen "Do you think Andie dropped this?". First time I've seen him crack a smile.

Stephen : Stephen's Note: Chicks dig a guy covered in animal blood.

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: We stopped near an ocean after trekking for a few miles. Hua went fishing and somehow managed to catch what looked like a dinosaur. I went to a quick swim and bath. Stephen didn't, though.. he was just staring at Paola, whilst covered in entrails from the last animals he came across.

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: We found a small boat and dangled Terrence's legs over the side. Empilodon is what's for dinner tonight.

Stephen : Stephen's Note: Make sure to release "Stephen Seagull: Hero of the Daedalus" before anybody has a chance to interview any of the crew.

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: Secret page - DO NOT READ. Just in case my memory fails me in the future, the last entry was a lie. I was ashamed to admit I feared for my legs, so I made up a nice cover story in case anyone reads my logs. Stephen was still hovering over Paola like a dog in heat, though.

Roland : We REALLY need fuel next time. And quite fast cause without fuel we couldn't avoid hunters. BTW Hua if not much hunters here we can possibly kill all and collect scraps - a chance for fuel capsule.

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: Me and Terrence are spending the better part of our hour here on Popooine by looking for some scrap metal. Our mission? Big spinning rims!

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: Three suns, Gioele? Why don't you drag your fat ass down here and push ME AND TERRENCE AND GET HEATSTROKE!?

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: Stephen made a comment about the wheelchair. "You should put a sail and a mast on that rustbucket". I'm not sure if it was the Mage Tech book he read, but that's a pretty damn smart idea.

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: I told Terrence he should put a sail and a mast on ride, you know? Trick it out! Also why doesn't he just build a wheelchair pushing drone?

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: Hua? Hua!? HUA!?

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: Hua had to stop for a breather, and Stephen went to go see if she was feeling OK. I was busy working on ideas for a wheelchair-pushing drone that Stephen mentioned. And what colour rims I should have on the chair. Stephen came back with some kinda grin on his face, and said "I can't find Hua." Maybe she went back to the ship..

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: ME AND TERRENCE WERE SUPPOSE TO MAKE SURE WE KEPT THE GROUP TOGETHER AND SAFE! PAOLA IS GOING TO KILL ME!

Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: Using some vines and leaves I scavenged from the forest, as the rest of the group looked for Hua, I set about making that mast and sail for my wheelchair. It was pretty slick, until a storm kicked up and picked me and my chair off the floor, slamming me into the canopy of the trees! Hopefully Stephen will hear my shouts for help and get me down from here.. pretty sure there's a branch lodged inside my thigh too..

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: WHO PUT THIS DAMN STORM HERE!

Terrence : Phew.. that was one crazy trip! Maybe I can sell these logs as some kinda biography back on Sol.

Roland : It cause you were all in attention for Terrence! Please next time rememeber that expos are not just tourists walks!

Stephen : Stephen's Journal: Me and Terrence fashioned a crude dummy of Hua with some fruits, vines and sticks to fool Paola but I gotta convince everybody we gotta go back to Poopoine.

Terrence : You're right. It's not a tourist walk. That's why I was sat down the whole time.


Terrence : Terrence's Awesome (not-quite) Captain's Log: Poor Stephen got so shook up about Hua disappearing, we made him a puppet-Hua out of fruit. He was so distraught, he didn't see Hua sat right next to him on the Icarus as we flew back to the ship. Poor guy.

Roland : WHERE IS THE LOG??? What zones were visited ??? Any ruins?

Roland : Doesn't matter now - only 14 shield left!!! We need to move away ASAP!!

Paola : People get quarantined by Neron for breaking the rules on ships now ended, serious, major rule violations. Repeated griefing is maybe the most common reason, but also if you say, surrender when you are picked for mush, especially if you out your partner too and do that repeatedly.... only Gioele could have told us what he did wrong. But it's super rare to get quarantined for a first offense. It can happen, but it would have to be SUCH a bad offense. Considering how nicely Gioele played on this ship, I suspect he might have been zinged for not wanting to play when Mush....

Janice : Sigh...if only you were a computer...

Paola : whimpers and clings to her pillow and blankets

Stephen :

Terrence : There there, Paola. Eat some bananas. They have Happy-molecules inside them. They will make the mind boo-boos disappear, through complex science stuff.

Stephen : Why not try Stephen?

Stephen : It's safe for consumption.

Stephen : YOU SHOULD EAT IT

Paola : I'm moving to alpha dorm! Much as I want to be surrounded by people... I think Ian needs to be surrounded by people in this bed more than me

NERON [Automated Message] : Great, the Gravity Simulator is now out of service! Please get a move on and repair that for me! And look at me when I'm speaking to you!

This is a dig at the captain's initial inability to differentiate the NERON auto troll announcements on broken beds from Janice manual troll announcementsJin Su : I don't think the whole "insane person tries to treat other insane person" works, NERON.

And, no, they can't be!! Janice told me so!! Did she lie!? Mraaah!!

NERON : But ... but ... I just showed you right there! Beds can break spontaneously and at any time!! You never know even when the bed you're sleeping on may break beneath you!! [Hax!]

Jin Su : Jin Su curls up in fetal position, floating around on the Bridge.



NERON [Automated Message] : Great, the CryoModule is now out of service! Repair it quickly, thanks you!

Jin Su : Because it was working so well in the first place.

NERON : Don't be sardonic, captain. The CryoModule only chewed up the brains of a 36% of your crew to begin with. Now it destroys brains with 100% succession.

Jin Su : It fell apart as fast as we stepped out of it! You even said it yourself, how it would be lethal stepping back into it. How can it be more broken than that?

NERON : Don't make me break your bed !! [Hax!]

Jin Su : You keep away from my bed!! I'll pour Stephen's soup into your core!!

NERON : I'd like to see you try. The nexus door is broken for a reason [Hax!]



NERON : Scans indicate possible steel-plate induced brain damage. [Hax!] Kuan Ti is sleeping peacefully in the corner of the room. He's so cute when he drools...

Jin Su : Yeah, it's about time we consider turning towards Eden before this kind of stuff leads to lethal accidents. Let's see how much research we can do next cycle, and how things are looking then.

NERON : You worry too much captain. He's only sleeping... He'll be fine in a cycle or two. Maybe. [Hax!] You could always shove him back into cryo and fix him later. [Hax!]

Stephen : In that broken broken cryo?
ps Jin, dropped the soup at RC

Jin Su : Do know I only offered myself to Frieda because I feared for her life, and know I still left the ball in her court!

Eleesha : It seems you've been looking at every other woman but me lately. As soon as I get pregnant, you lose all interest. I should have known you as that type of guy.

Jin Su : I'm sorry, Eleesha. I like you, I really do, but I cannot risk losing my main astrophysicist and I happened to be the closest able body. If you want me to swing by the refectory, let me know. But do know I have many duties and a busy schedule, so don't be surprised if I show up all exhausted and you end up doing all the work again... I will never hold it against you if you see other men, I'm not that type of guy!

Eleesha : That's easy for you to say when you know that I don't care about any other men.
Eleesha : And don't try to tell me that you really believed Frieda's "If I don't get laid now, I'll kill myself"-line. That one is a millennium old. She's a tough old bitch. We won't get rid of her that easily. Besides, what I've heard was that she wanted Andie, but you were all over her - trying to mess up their relationship as well.
Eleesha : I don't even know what you see in her. She is an ancient fossil while I'm young and have fancier hair. Do you find her knowledge of astrophysics sexy? I can learn that too! I have this handy little book, right here.

Jin Su : You don't need to be an astrophysicist to be admirable! I didn't know Frieda flirted with Andie, as soon as I found out there was something between them, I backed off. I'll prove it to you, if I get the chance...

Eleesha : Admirable? That's not good enough - I want to be irresistible. And I'm sure you knew all along even if you ... erm, technically weren't in the channel where they discussed it.
Eleesha : And I'm apparently yelling so loud that they can hear it in that other channel.

Jin Su : Hmm yes, going behind the captain's back has been a problem since we woke up... I don't know what else to say, I can only offer you what I have to offer. I fully understand if it isn't enough for you, part of me thought it was still better than the alternative though. Just don't do anything rash, our child deserves a fair shot at life!
Jin Su : Shall I swing by the refectory on my way up to the lab? I'm at 15, so I can hold off for the day, but I guess I have something to prove

Eleesha : I can't take any more of your lies at the moment. I just went to Alpha Dorm to hear you talk and you didn't even notice me. Chun, you could stare at. And Frieda, definitely. Even Raluca did you ogle. It's as if I don't exist to you as soon as there's another woman in the room.

Jin Su : Could you, erm... please, like... get up? just for a second, this shouldn't take long

Eleesha : I know I shouldn't listen to you.

Jin Su : Oh, I was willing to do the work this time! I feel like you're just looking for reasons to hate me...

Eleesha : That would have required me to flirt with you which I'm really not in the mood for.

Jin Su : What if I stay here for a few cycles?

Eleesha : Of course you can stay, but if you're not going to make an effort to treat me better from now on, it might be better if you leave and let me weep alone. I don't have much chance of getting over you when you're so close.

Jin Su : Come on Eleesha, don't be like that. We're gonna have a baby, and I would really prefer him/her not to grow up in a troubled family. I will wholeheartedly admit the Frieda thing was a mistake on my part, but the stuff in alpha dorm, you're just imagining! The only reason I was avoiding eye-contact with you was because well... there is a lot of judgement and disappointment in those eyes right now.
I know I'm not good enough for you, none of us are! But of all the men on this ship, who would be a better father than me? Roland? Hah, that pea-for-brain knows nothing that doesn't involve explosions! Ian? I don't think I even have to go there, we all thought he was a shroom! I guess Gioele would be a better provider, but with his coffee-habit, how long do you really think he will last?
I am the only father-figure around that can live up to his responsibilities. And trust me, I will. However, I know you are left with little choice, so I will stick purely to my duties and leave other initiatives entirely up to you. I understand if you want to keep our relationship purely platonic, but do realize I am but a mere mortal with a morale gauge, and I will not be looking to fill it elsewhere. Just let me know when I should leave the refectory...
Jin Su : Oh and let me know if there is anything else I can get you!
Jin Su : I... cooked you something...

Eleesha : Thank you for caring. I do need to eat well.
Eleesha : As for father figure, I don't want one that runs after anything with breasts. If you have to be like that, the best father figure around seems to be Robo Isaac. He's hard-working, dependable, and doesn't seem to be dominated by his sexual desires. He probably can't do as much for my needs as you, but he's also unlikely to break my heart repeatedly.

Jin Su : Might take a banana as well, let you rest up a bit. Unless you feel like it, I'm at 14 morale already though, you've been taking good care of me

Eleesha : Well, you sure don't have to if you don't want to. Enjoy your banana.

I understand if you are too tired, being forced to run around the ship healing people and getting trapped in rooms, all whilst expecting a child... tbh, if I had it my way, I would have a banana and sex, at the same time!

There were PostIt's thrown all over our ship (actually a casting ship so we have Finola and Chao). I have to save this one:

Dear NERON. I never dared to tell you - but I think I seriously fell in love with you. The smell of your platines makes me feel confident. When I hear your synthetic voice, my heart beats faster than it should. But most of all it's your overwhelming intellect, your badass brutal way to tell everyone's far below your level of existance. You cheer up people just to break their hearts. And you have a clear vision of what is right or wrong. You might never know this because I think reading PostIt's is not in your first interest. But it feels good to actually wrote it down.

And NERON's reaction to it

Janice : What is... NERON you should probably read this post-it...
Finola : Oh, I think I know which one you're talking about. I came accross it not too long ago in Icarus Bay...
NERON : blabla... Oh... What... What?... Well... I AM badass... Uh... Aww... It's absolutely adorable! To be expected that I would have fans. It's about time someone shows me some damn appreciation! I work harder than the whole crew combined! You've been a good minion whoever wrote this! Continue being my minion and show these apes the meaning of evolution! Especially that Finola! Walkin' around like she owns the place! She was stupid enough to be caught by someone like CHAO who slips on his own drool!

Roland : When they hear her whole story, especially how she got here, I don't think any court is going to rule against Ms. Keegan on anything...
Stephen : I don't know... using all natural fertilizers seems in line with your ideals. At any rate, I'm not going to judge. What you do in your private gardens in your own time is none of my business. Just keep those bananas away from me

Ian : Oh, I definitely self-fertilize the plants, but not in the manner Finola was suggesting!
Gioele : raining jumpkins? oh i'm sure ian rains on those little plants of his all the time

Ian : I don't defile the fruits, Stephen, just the soil. Aren't you a chef? Surely you can prepare the fruit in an appetizing way!

Stephen : So you admit to defiling the garden now?? I'd rather work with this disgusting ration-goop or wild moth abdomen meat. I take pride in the quality of my creations and I'm not compromising that by incorporating anything grown in that garden!
Ian : No one brought any fertilizer. Someone needs to explain to Stephen how fertilizers worked on Sol. I didn't invent the practice, but I'm the only one willing to carry it out on the ship!

1: A mush removes a spore.

3: The spore bonds to the spinal column.
4: After two more spore exposures, the host has been converted into a Mush.

Rain

On my current ship I've been a shy, anxious Raluca who is determined to make friends and increasingly coming out of her shell. It's been a blast. Our Eleesha, who nicknames herself 'GossipGirl' in ship IRC, maintains ELEESHA'S WONDERFUL COLUMN, where she posts tabloid style updates extrapolated from things people say or do. They're without exception terribly trashy and utterly hilarious but this latest one takes the cake.

The Context:

Eleesha : Derek, you may stay in Bridge until after cycle change.
Derek : Paola healed 4 HP and at full health
Eleesha : I'm totally willing to share Paola with you, you know, now that you're into our kind and all.
Derek : need to go back to FC to pick up my jumpkins
Paola : I'm not an OBJECT!!
Derek : Junkins safely in my hands again
Eleesha : All fine in Bridge.
Raluca : Eleesha... as someone with four friends now... pauses to enjoy that fact for a moment... I think I can say, people will be your friend more if you are nice to them and try to see how you can make them happy instead of how you can use them for your ratings. And, the best part is, it will make you happy too!

The 'Article'

Eleesha : IT'S OFFICIAL! It seems that ex-virgin sergeant and goth queen have been domesticated! They reportedly have a daily "routine" together in various rooms across the ship, presumably in case they get bored of the same location for their activities. How cute! Just recently the ex-virgin declines to join rich girl Paola (who objects too much) and your very own bombshell reporter for an innocent discussion session in the Bridge. The goth queen immediately protests at the thought of her other half spending time with a rich woman and a gorgeous woman, even going as far as asserting she has four "friends", presumably as a violent threat. I shudder at the thought of drones and cats messing up my fabulous hair! Or, perhaps by "friends" she didn't mean "subordinates", but "lovers"? Oh my, I'd watch my heart if I were you, sergeant!
On september 8, 2014
[8147734]
RainThe 'Article'

Eleesha : IT'S OFFICIAL! It seems that ex-virgin sergeant and goth queen have been domesticated! They reportedly have a daily "routine" together in various rooms across the ship, presumably in case they get bored of the same location for their activities. How cute! Gallade

Sigh...the bad part of Mutating as a Mush is that you can't exchange any more witty banter with the human crew. But I did leave them with some ear candy...at least, I think it sounded good.

(Pretend there's an Eleesha emoticon here):"This looks like a pretty promising ship. Gold players, lots of activity, it would seem well on the route to Eden. There's just three problems."
(Pretend there's an Eleesha emoticon here):"First, it's day 5 and still no expedition in sight, and our only O2 planet was busted by poor communication between Jin and Kuan"
(Pretend there's an Eleesha emoticon here):"Second, we don't have any armor or shield, and even with three pilots, fuel will run out eventually, and it's unlikely we'll get more because of point one"
(Pretend there's an Eleesha emoticon here):"The third...is me".

(One cide later)
(Pretend there's an Eleesha emoticon here):"Now we fight like men! And women! And Andies! For Eleesha...it's morphing time!"
(Berserker Mush who unfortunately fails to kill Stephen)

Well, with an idiotic partner who got himself killed literally seconds after selection, and Gold Ian foiling any hope of infecting...that was pretty much the only valid move I had left. Maybe the AP they'll spend killing me will set them back just enough to make a difference...

Also, if I have a regret it's that the battle didn't take place on the bridge to make full use of the reference, and to kill Jin (I always want to kill him, either as a Mush suspect or as a Human when I'm Mush). But Raluca was Gold...she was the top priority targer.

RalucaYou might find that cat's worth more than you know. [7950824]
Addem-UpJin SuExcellent organizational work, Ms. Tomescu. While I see that you brought your... cat... I will be prepared to overlook this thanks to your efforts to keep the ship running.RalucaYou might find that cat's worth more than you know. I see several possible scenarios where that cat's presence eases your piloting duties, helps keep control over any disorder or violence we experience aboard the ship, and may save more than one human life from the misery we might feel this trip. It's even possible that you, Sir, will find yourself thanking me on behalf of all humanity, that I had the foresight and courage to bring that 'beast' aboard. You're welcome in advance, Commander.Jin Su...He is rather cute.

Things were so rough on this ship, we never made the lenses, so they were never used to pilot or help aim a blaster shot. Not even sure if anyone even hugged the cat, we had so much trouble. But morale was part of the trouble for a time, so maybe. I know I never did, never even saw my cat again until it was time to genius the cure, immediately before going back to Sol.

But we did get it all sorted out.

And so our PM ends, moments before Pilgred engages:

Jin SuLet me begin this message by congratulating you on your successful completion of the PILGRED reactor, and your subsequent discovery of the Retro-Fungal Serum. Armed with these two technologies, we may stand a chance of winning the war with the Mush. It has been an honor to work alongside you, and an experience I shall never forget. But... that leads me to a question I've been hesitant to ask, for fear that you'd answer. What will you do after we land?

RalucaMmm. You mean after we win the war, when we get to make choices of what we want to do, instead of what we must do? .... I'm not certain what. But with who, now that I've got a clue. Raluca reaches slowly towards your hand. I. It's a bit much for me to hope that what we've enjoyed together. Well. What I've enjoyed with you here. Well. Maybe it isn't all, entirely, duty? I know you're a leader, and you need to keep us all motivated. But... Well. After the world is saved and we've done what we must. I admit that. I like the idea of. Well. Whatever you're going to do then, do you think you might want some help with it?

Jin Su:Whatever I'm going to do after we land, I don't believe I could do it without you. So... Yes, Raluca. I would like that very much.

RalucaMe too. Oh, me too. I'm ready Jin, ready for whatever comes next. More ready than before. It's so good not to feel so alone. We're going to need two bedrooms, but. Between the cycle changes, lets share one or the other, sometimes, alright?

Jin Su:Of course. Though ...We may need yet another bedroom in the near future, if you're that... excited.

RalucaRaluca giggles and blushes, her hand slipping from yours to cover her face as she laughs.

Jin Su:Jin's smile is the most genuine it's been in a long while, the commander chuckling as he sits back. For the first time in far too long, I am excited to see what the new day brings. And I suspect that, so long as I am with you, that spark will never leave.

On november 8, 2014
npfan
Misterme7We forgot the drill for an expo.
Hua: Where is the drill? The drill is... in the kitchen!
According to Hua this is a French joke.

In case you don't get it, it's based on beginning English lessons that French students might study. There is a description of a Twinoid accomplishment for playing Stephen some number of cycles that says, 'Where is Stephen? Stephen is...in the kitchen!'

[7950824]

Most favorite conversations include RP. This one doesn't. Last two players on a ship.... doing anything to find a way to win.


Roland : I'm here, Raluca. Are you?
Roland : I have 3 AP, 3 morale, 1 move point. I'm currently full.
Roland : Janice never turned food destruction off. The coffee and cooked ration that were in alpha dorm are gone. Our edible resources: the new day's coffee, still in the machine. The rations still in refectory. The two new bananas produced today. If neither of us gets a panic attack, I estimate the hunters will kill us on C4. How much AP do you have now? YOu have your two new pilgred points. If we can finish Pilgred, I can sprint to the bridge maybe with 2 AP to get us to sol. That's what's going to have to happen at least. Here comes today's mission.
Raluca : I have 1 pilgred pont and 4AP...
Raluca : with the mission I have 7 AP...
Raluca : Well.. wait a second...
Raluca : I have taken the gold mode... because you seem nice lol ^^
Raluca : So my efficiency on PILGRED is better now
Raluca : So ? Shall we go ? I can go to the refectory and take 2 rations...
Roland : Hope it is going to be enough to save us, heh. It's just you and me now. If I run to pilgred to reset you, I can only do so once this cycle. And that won't save us, so this cycle probably won't matter. Heh, this ship is a good reason to consider trying to rush pilgred early.... but that is so useful to the mush team sometimes
Roland : Well, I can't eat until next cycle. And then I can eat a coffee and one thing, be it a banana or a ration, and then I'll be full again. And I have 2 AP left after giving the mission.... I actually can't reset you this cycle. Cause I'd convert AP to MP.... and only have 1 left. And there's no one else to reset you
Roland : That gold mode would have helped more before we did our recent pilgred rushing, heh. I don't think I can do anything else this cycle. Will you be able to check in next cycle?
Raluca : So we will wait for the next cycle ?
Raluca : lol you know it's 2 hours in the morning... but I will try to be here at 4...
Raluca : And.. I didn't wanted to take a gold mode because I play on french server usually... but hey it's only 10 euros......
Raluca : Maybe I could eat 1 ration now and eat another on the next cycle ? I have 5 MP now.
Roland : Next cycle if I take coffee and ration, I can eat both of those in that order, I will need 7 move points to go from AD to ref to engine room. I'll have 2, and am sprinter, so that's 2 AP spent to move to engine room. I'll have 4 AP and 2 from coffee, 5 from ration. Minus 2 for the move points. I'll have enough AP for 4 resets, but that won't let me get us to Sol too. If you get the coffee and ration to the engine room for me, you'll spend that 7 moves and some AP (Scooter is in bravo dorm, right?), but I'll just have to spend 3 moves to reach engine room, I will have 10 AP I could put into resets, with none left for moving or getting to sol. We're at 46%. You'd be at 9 AP, you can eat a ration, use scooter.... you'd get to engine room with about 10 AP to spend on pilgred, plus the point. Assume we get 10% between us each pair of resets.... we're going to be at about 96% pilgred. So that's actually possible. And if we do live to C3, which is likely.... So we have to worry about how to get me from engine room to bridge with 2 AP to get us to sol.
Roland : If you eat a ration you will be full for 2 cycles. If you're human at least
Roland : Raluca, would C3 be better for you than C2? Would that fit your sleep schedule better?
Raluca : Well, is it possible or not ? I can bring the ration in the engine at 4.... or maybe I could eat 1 ration now and another the next cycle....
Roland : We probably will be alive C3. We'll each have 2 more AP than we would C2. I just have to make sure I can get from engine room to bridge with at least 2 AP left to spend to get us home.
Raluca : Actually no... At C3 I would surely be asleep...
Raluca : Actually I can eat rations without cooking it, because I have 6 points of morale left...
Roland : Consider how much AP you turn into movement, if you have to go to refectory to eat/bring coffee and ration for me. How much movement do you have now?
Roland : You're only going to be able to eat 1 ration, either this cycle or next cycle. Because rations make you full for 2 cycles if you haven't eaten for a while. I ate a ration last cycle. I can eat again next cycle, 2 cycles later, but anything I eat will make me full again. Bananas for 1 cycle, ration for the next 4 cycles, because bananas are 1 satiation, rations are 4.
Raluca : Actually I have 7 AP and 5 MP. I have the itrackie and the bike is ine my dorm.
Roland : Ok, thinking.
Raluca : Sorry if I have some problem to follow you lol, I'm not native english... (btw my english is ok or not ?).
Roland : Your English is good. Better than many people who are not native speakers.
Raluca : Thank you... So, do I bring you the ration next cycle ? (I will have to drop either the talkie or the bike).
Roland : Ok, here is plan. It is the only way I can see maybe this works.

Next cyclem you will have 9 AP, 6 moves, 1 Pilgred point. Talk to me, let me answer, we are ready to start.
We start: You go to refectory.
You Drop itrackie.
You Get 2 raw rations.
You Get the coffee from the machine.
You Do not eat or drink yet.
You Go to engine room. You now have 8 AP, 2 moves, 1 Pilgred point
You Drop coffee.
You Drop ration.
I go to Engine room. I now have 3 AP, 4 moves.
We can whisper to each other there, you won't need itrackie
I drink coffee
I eat ration. I now have 10 AP, 4 moves.
We trade resets.
You eat when the AP will not be wasted.
I don't reset you the last time - you push the end and finish. Because I need AP/moves to get to Engine room. I can only reset you 4 times.
Raluca : Ok, I will follow the plan ! so I don't take the bike... ok I hope the luck will be ours !
Roland : I mean, I need the AP/moves to get to the bridge.
Roland : Yes. I think we need to live to C3 for me to get us back to Sol. I think I will have only 1 AP when I get to the bridge. But thanks to you being alive still, and you having bought the gold (thank you!) we have a chance.
Roland : If I get a panic attack, I die at cycle change I think. Nothing we can do about that.
Roland : 18 hunters could kill us in one cycle. It is very rare. But they can all hit and all do 3 damage each, and some get critical hits. It is unlikely.
Raluca : But, after you eat, you will only have 9 AP ?
Raluca : Well, at least we would have doned anything to get back to Sol ! (I think I will remember this game lol).
Roland : Paola got us the upgrade from decoding the D3 rebel base. I ate last cycle and got 5 AP. YOu will get 5 AP from food too
Roland : I will remember this game too! Win or lose... and I will remember you too Thank you, Raluca. YOu are very special and a very good player.
Raluca : Great !
Raluca : Thanks you too ! I don't know what to say lol. (this game is really great...)
Raluca : Hey, I can participate 7 on the Pilgred, so I will 2x2 times without relay, because I don't lost to much %, ok ?
Raluca : I think I can also cook the ration for you because I will 1 AP left...
Roland : Up to you. I won't die from 1 raw ration. If you cook, use express cook. We don't need the connection to sol anymore
Raluca : Good idea ! but normally you have 3 points of morale, so even if you panic you won't die, is it ?
Roland : Panic attacks are -3 morale. I have 3 morale, so if I get a panic attack, I go to 0 morale and suicide.

Hell, the entire game is about humanity's triumph over immeasurable odds.

On december 16, 2014
[7950824]

Terrence : It's ... kind of fun reading the entirety of our public ship log. So much hope, dashed so soon.

NERON : I understand Terrence. I've freed you from my control... at least my control of your mind... how does it feel, knowing oblivion is coming?

Terrence : ...I'm not afraid anymore NERON. Janice is here still, if not in her original body. Lying here, waiting for the end... it's peaceful.

NERON: Do you hear my hull?

Terrence : Yes. The gentle tap, tap, tap of the hunters on the hull. It's stopped. All that's left is the creaking and hissing of the Daedalus, on her final flight through infinite space.

NERON : I could let you two out. Allow you to escape on the hunters. Would you like that Terrence? Freedom to return to Sol with your own kind? I could grant it easily enough.

Terrence : ...I think... not.

My place is here. Xyloph, the Daedalus, my drones. I belong here with them. I belive Janice may also feel that way.

This silent, empty ship is our home. We will never leave it.

NERON : I... understand... Terrence. You have made your choice, and I mine. Goodbye.

Raluca : Keep me, Neron. Keep us. Mother and Father to the drones that serve you. Brother and Sister in the spores we bear, for your ship, for others. Dance with us, Neron. Carry us. Cherish us. Bring us to the place of our next conquest. Let us delight with you, in seeing not just this, but all missions succeed.

[7950824]

Names and dates may have been changed to protect endangered species and other (not so?) innocents.

Day 1
My partner: Hey! Never had much success at Mush, but I'm definitely interested in going for the long game if that's what you're interested in!
Day 2
My partner: I'm looking forward to this. Normally I hate being Mush, but this could actually be a LOT of fun.
Day 3
My partner: There we go. Beautiful work, if I do say so myself. xD
Why this is a favorite conversation for me: Look at that growth in confidence. This is a player who really had fun, and started off expecting unfun, so I feel extra great!

DarkTheRaven

On february 12, 2015
rebex1213

D'aww. Thank you, thank you!

Day 4:
I'm glad to see you get a relatively stress free win that you got to be incredibly helpful with - you've helped earn everything we accomplished so far.

Why this is a favorite conversation for ME: Every time I've been a Mush, I've ended up with terrible partners who mess up very early on, and while I've always tried to succeed anyway, I didn't really have enough experience with playing as a Mush. I love that the first time I ended up with a good partner, they gave me lots of opportunities to help out, and explained their process every step of the way. It's made this ship not only be a lot of fun, but also a great educational experience.

Here's to you, Impet!

Finola : Forbidden fruit? Sounds delicious.
Roland : You worry too much. Your grandchildren will be perfect, I promise
Jin Su : "My genes are flawless!" said the short short man. Id like humanity to still be able to ride on the roller coaster once we've populated Eden.
Roland : If they'll have any brains, which mine would, they can always figure a clever way around around these things.
And if you had any kids, Jin Su, they wouldn't even fit on the 'coster in the first place
Paola : Daddy, I am inclined to agree with you. Twice I tried to visit with him in the MedLab at his request and twice he was dead asleep snoring when I got there. I even waited around an hour for him to wake up the second time. I know it's because he's moved on to fancying Chun. Hrumph
Paola : So Daddy dearest. You frowned terribly about my dear Kivan. You openly disapprove of Roland. :| Who would you have me date?
Roland : No way, that's not true at all! I didn't "move onto" Chun, she was the first before you
Roland : I can visit you on the Bridge in a few cycles, we will continue defiling the command terminal
Gioele : Paola, you may not date. I prefer that you become a Nun. On Eden we will need spiritual guidance.
Roland : I think it's too late for her to become a Nun. She already tasted the forbidden fruit with me
Gioele : <covers ears> LALALALALALALAALLALA
Paola : It's true. With someone like Roland around, spiritual guidance will be much needed. I think I shall start a CULT with Kivan as our celestial channel for higher wisdom and insight into the dangers of advanced civilizations like Sol that draw attention of infernal creatures like THE MUSH.
Roland : If Frieda could step out from the Bridge for a second, I would be more than happy to provide you some spiritual guidance, if you know what I mean
Gioele : Don't listen to him Princess! Once you're with child he'll start sleeping with Eleesha!
Frieda : I am currently at Front Alpha Turret, obversing the moving stars
Roland : Okay, I'm here Paola sweetie
Paola : Daddy, we read some scripture together.
Paola : Don't mind him. He can't help but see the dirty side of every story.
Gioele : ... I would prefer it if you "read scripture" on your own.
Roland : But reading together is more FUN! youpi
Gioele : Stop corrupting me daughter!


Jin Su : Quit hacking my ship dammit! I know why you keep doing this, you have title envy! You want my title!
Roland : Oh yes, the commanders title would be nice! I would be able to do it with ladies on the command terminal while moving the ship lol wouldn't it be romantic?
Jin Su : I was referring to gioele. I'd crash this thing to a star before letting your grubby hands on the title

Seems I'm the only one using this thread these days. Fair enough.... maybe I like conversations more than most

The day before I posted the above favorite, this conversation was had. I'm Eleesha. Note the timestamps, or rather I should say, Daystamps on the messages. Ship is still in play as I type.

RolandHunters ~12d
Roland4 hunters down, next pilot grab the scrap asap so sofa can be built ~12d
Rolandwow, i was gone almost 20hrs and not a single pilot collected scrap, well, i guess we're blowing up by day 5 if im the only pilot who is going to be doing jack this whole time...scrap collected btw ~11d
Eleesha Hey there! We have Jin pilot and Hua pilot. Jin's active but very new, and he failed his surgery (started injured) so cost him 8 AP there, plus he's pretty newbie. We got him healed and his sepsis cured, so he won't die. We got him into a bed and I've encouraged him to only spend AP on piloting and essential commander duties. So there's hope. Also Stephen is probably going to apprentice to pilot, and he's shooter, so I bet we're going to be OK. We're also now working on the net, so Pilot drones and pilots landed by ship moved are also possibly in our future. With luck and patience.... this is actually looking like it might be a really extra-good ship ~11d
Rolandwall of text crits your for 14, you die, sorry im not reading that..just fix the problem or we die ~11d
Eleesha Love you too. Don't think we have a problem. ~11d

Recent events on this ship, well. The fire broke the calculator, but we already used it. We'll head to Eden when we're good and ready, we have a bunch of new and newer players on this ship, so we're escorting them to the later days of the game, letting them learn and get more practice fixing problems. Plus, we like each other, or are very, very good at pretending to We don't want to end this early, cause it's fun.

Even with the mush killing all pilots, even with all the problems this ship had, those problems are just something to overcome. With teamwork, luck, and a determination to try to use everything to achieve the goals, take every best chance we get, save every resource possible for the really urgent problems - it can be done and done well. We have a commander active about 5 minutes a day, who doesn't (can't?) read all the messages and just randomly does whatever... sometimes even moving the ship when it needs to not be moved eeeeeeeeek:

EleeshaOne of the things I'm proudest about this ship - we were able to get so far and so much achieved playing around Chao's limitations with online time and capacity to read. I'm so proud of us for not killing him to make it easier

FinolaHey, hey! I kinda enjoy Chao's comment about him being firefighter or handyman of the ship. Such a cute thing

He's told us it's his first ship. Sometimes there's talk even on a ship about to go to Eden, stuff like: 'Does this player deserve to go to Eden? Lets kill him before we go!'... We're not talking about that. We're saying things like:

Kuan TiWell he helped us at the best he could, that's all we are asking for

That's our Kuan, who told me it's his second ship. Kuan's taken quite a nice cheerleader role, helping keep up morale (both players and characters both, woo Kuan Juan!), helping organize everyone.

Kuan TiIt's kind of intimidating... It's like my 2nd game + my terrible english, it doesn't help me but... Yeah, I do my best

Moral of my story?

Dooon't give up! Keep playing. Keep trying. Roll with the punches. Do teamwork. help each other. Play nice. Play hard, but nice. Play with absolute determination to win for your team.... nicely. Do not write a ship off. Ever. Let the ship tell you it's over, because that ship has killed you. Until then, give that ship all you have. That 'impossible' situation may be the one your team finds a way to get an incredible win with. Give it that chance.

If you're one of those players who looks at stuff going wrong and thinks, 'Right, game over'. Nope. Stop that. Head up, eyes open. Save your ship! It's a lot of fun.

And sometimes, it works. I'll see you guys on Eden. This ship'll be there when it's time for us to complete our win.

Kenik13Also The random ships I do rarely have any personality.

Amazing. Almost every ship I get has personality. Usually lots of it. I can hardly stop talking about my fascinating ships....

They're randoms. I almost always random, like 1 in 40 of my ships is a coordinated jump of some kind.

I'm looking for you, all of you. Each and every stranger and player I already know on every ship I play. I don't know who you are yet, whomever is going to be there. I may not even recognize you if I know you - but I'm looking for you.

You can make every ship you play awesome. You can give every ship you have your all.

Remember, no matter what else is going on, you are on your ship. If you decide to take action, there is no way any ship of your can... "have no personality". At absolute lowest.... you can give it yours. Try it and see how many people are there, waiting, hoping, wanting someone to team up with and play back with you. Reach out, and find those other players' hands reaching out for yours. It's awesome, and doesn't take a casting, a MMM, a sunday-mushday. Every ship, I do so swear, I give my all and almost every one of them is awesome back for me.

[7950824]
Kenik13(Comment about Chao,) And yeah it is amusing when useless people thing they're important.

For me, silly enough.... When I said I was proud we didn't kill him? I meant it.

He's not really useless. He fixed some broken things, extinguished a few fires, he shot some turret shots, he moved the ship right once, he gave at least 2 missions.

Did I want him to do other things? Sure. But he wasn't useless. I'm proud we kept him part of the team. For every player who says 'you have to kill useless commanders', well I point at this ship and say, 'Really?', cause we didn't, and we recovered from losing all pilots and still handled the hacks around our commander who couldn't.

Would we have done better to kill him, or even insult him? Does he even think he's important? Chances are he is glad to find something to do and yeah, what he did helped.

The answer to those two questions is no, we couldn't have done better without him. We're going to Eden - you can't do better than that. We're going to Eden with him. Despite him, for those who insist, but he was far, very far from the greatest of the challenges we faced. Oh boy can it be done.

He's learning slow, but he's learning. And he was so not useless. Among his 'uses': He's a source of pride to us all. He's part of our team. He's one of us.

Gioele, you are not Shwarzenegger or Hasselhoff. Without good muscles this is not working. Put up some clothes, please. ~5h

Gioele :

Look, the mush raid on drydock happened really fast. I didn't have any time to bring any other clothes. But at least I brought this towel, too.. ~4h

Andie :

That towel is not a SDF standard-issue towel, remove it from this ship at once or I will report your subordination to the captain! ~4h

Andie :

*insubordination ~4h

Gioele :

ok, I'm taking off the towel...

[Cabaret Music] ~4h

Eleesha :

Losts her conciousness from the sight ~2h


I think I'm going to like this new ship

On december 31, 2015
Kenik

So the ship is ending, when everyone else died, I got bored and started talking to Neron as portrayed by me.

NERON : AstroTerminal is malfunctioning. Repairs required. 30min

Eleesha :
So my last chance at anything is literally going up in flames? 21min

NERON :
Poetic isn't it? 20min

Eleesha :
Sure, it's a lot more depressing than amusing though. 20min

And a bit before then this started, also with just me.

Eleesha :
Terrence AND Janice were mush? I guess terri was the first one. Great. 29min

NERON :
Well Ms.Williams, This seems to be your last day. And nearly my last. Anything to say? 26min

Eleesha :
Yeah, wish that I had done a better job hunting the mush down. If I could have eliminated that first greatest challenge. It would have gone so much better. 25min

NERON :
Well if it's any consolation, I will be forced to remember you forever. 23min

Eleesha :
Small favors when humanity is dying. 23min

NERON :
... 21min

Eleesha :
Wait won't these fires be a problem once I die? 16min

NERON :
So much for lying to make you feel better. 16min

Eleesha :
I'm not certain I even appreciate the sentiment. 15min

Eleesha :
Also weren't you designed to avoid that sort of thing? 15min

NERON :
You thought Pilgred was the first thing to break? Take a look at Derek, not exactly a threat to the crew, but he was crushed into pulp. 13min

Eleesha :
That's disturbing. 13min

NERON :
Oh don't worry I won't be mistaking you for an SDF trooper any time soon. That was a slightly... unusual glitch. 11min

Eleesha :
I'm more bothered by you not telling us. 10min

NERON :
The glitch was remedied immediately, I was not required to report it. And further it would have done me no good, or anyone else aboard with mush running amok. Nice work by the way. 8min

Eleesha :
It's a shame I don't have a knife to just end it now. None of this scrap looks that sharp either. 8min

NERON :
You could always jump out the bay door. 7min

Eleesha :
A bit slow, a bit cold. 6min

Eleesha :
Beggers being choosers? 6min

NERON :
Honestly it's my job to keep you sane, and not suicidal for as long as possible to extend your short little life. I suppose it's only fair you humans have done a mediocre job of keeping me in one piece. 4min

Eleesha :
And giving me ideas on killing myself? 3min

NERON :
It kept you from finding that sharp plate in the corner didn't it? 2min

Eleesha :
Hehehe I suppose it did. 2min

NERON :
Your world ends in 5 hours and 30 minutes. Why don't you find a cozy corner and try to make your last minutes a bit sweeter? moments ago

Eleesha :
Yeah, why not? moments ago

A major thing I was doing here was expositing my theory that Neron quarantines are why the SDF doesn't just charge in and kill everyone that way.

Janice : if someone can fix the door and guard cc i promise i can take him down

Kuan Ti : LEAVE MY DOOR ALONE. There's no way any human scum can unlock it so don't even bother trying...
Janice : i cant leave the room #
Kuan Ti : That's fine too, Gioele. You do that, I'll work on 'improving' this fine coffee machine in here. Did you know some mush have corrosive secretions? It's true!
Frieda : Janice just circle around
Raluca : Oh no, the Mush are going to break our coffee machine!
Frieda : I got AB go guard RC
Ian : I'll guard RC.
Gioele : Jin was on list kill ASAP.
Kuan Ti : Psst... Gioele, if you leave this instant, I'll promise to leave your coffee alone ... for now ...
Frieda : Chill we got the natamy
Kuan Ti : Oh my. Is that violence really necessary? Mush would never resort to such barbaric instruments. It is one of the many reasons your race needs to be pacified
Finola : why guarding when we need all energy in killing ?
Frieda : I dont have any weapons.Whoever has the knife and the guns can go and kill him.
Kuan Ti : Your levels of organization are astounding as well. How humans managed to get as far as they did when they're clearly an incompetent species is beyond me
Janice : someone point me to the mush and i'll stab them up
Finola : A dorm
Kuan Ti : Rear Corridor
Kuan Ti : Don't forget to get stuck on the guards and waste MP circling around as usual!
Kuan Ti [Changes to Premium skin] : I must say, this one that you call Kuan Ti had the worst taste in attire. I feel much better now
Raluca : All hail Kuan Ti, destroyer of coffee machines.
Kuan Ti : Yes yes, it's of the utmost importance that one can destroy coffee machines in style

[After cure]

Gioele : PAOOOLAAAA!!! I can't believe you have have betrayed my trust like this! I should disown you for this! I told you not to trust that twerp Kivanc and look what he's done to you now. You rampaged at the busiest point of my entire day leaving me to grunt at my crewmates while in reality I'm losing my mind. I'm disappointed, you couldn't even manage to kill an old lady, then went and threatened my coffee machine. My coffee machine. Who the flubbin heck is my real daughter now? If you've managed to place yourself in the body of that slimeball Kuan Ti... ...I need a cup of coffee... At least we were able to hold back the Janice from slicing the door down, I thought she might cut me to pieces for all those jokes from before.
Kuan Ti : Don't worry daddy, deep down, I'm still your little girl ... now with a fabulous cape! Don't trust that impostor in the medlab. She has poor fashion sense, even while she was the Kuan Ti who wasn't Kuan Ti
Kuan Ti : I get to keep the inheritance, yes?
Gioele : I don't want a son who's nearly as old as me. Just keep the old Paola away from me, we'll see...
Kuan Ti : As the supreme commander of the Daedalus, I command you to accept me as your loving daughter once again. Because I love you (and the inheritance) very much

Chun : ex-paola - what did you do with the Soap?
Kuan Ti : Ex-Paola didn't do anything with your soap. I would know. You know what I hated about my time as Paola? This camera getting in the way of any fun. No more I say!
Kuan Ti : Sorry Paola, I'm already spent for today. If you showed up 30m ago it would have been a perfect threesome. Maybe tomorrow?
Gioele : You will not be doing any of the sort with that filthy imposter that stole your body! Don't make me come up there.
Roland : Mind if I join at some point, bro? Sharing is caring, you know
Gioele : I MIND. Gimme that drill, I've found some crewmates in need of some holes.
Paola : Please, your daughter is inhabiting the body of a man now. And while Finola is a brilliant researcher, I'm not sure she has come up with any solution to reverse the process. So I might as well learn to enjoy my new body.
Kuan Ti : But daddy, I can make my own decisions about what I want to do with my own body
Gioele : No having sex with yourself! By god what if you got yourself pregnant?
Chun : Kind of brings new meaning to "Go fuck yourself"...... sorry Gioele, I know this isn't helping, this must be a difficult time for you. Look on the Bright side, at least Paola didn't transfer into a romantic interest of your own...
Terrence : We can say that in total they both know each other very well.
Gioele : Oh, don't worry, my romantic interest is immune to transfer.
Kuan Ti : But this is perfect. You didn't like Kivan and the others because they're sketchy outsiders. This way there are no more outsiders. The best person for your daughter is your daughter
Terrence : Gioele do not envy you being a father in this situation.
Gioele : Well, I suppose that's... No! I don't want to see that abomination all the time. That is beyond screwed up.
Paola : Don't worry Gioele, I'll take care of your daughter's body as if it were my own.
Gioele : What has become of the Rinaldo legacy...

I understand Schrodinger's Cat, but at this point, if I were a biologist, I think I would just come to the conclusion of, "The cat may be both dead and alive, but either way, it got itself pregnant, DNA has gone beyond simple efforts of self-propagation and evolution and is now clearly out of control and cannot be trusted, therefore for the greatest good I must stuff myself in a box, blow my brains out with a blaster, become both dead and alive, and get myself pregnant in the process so my child can continue my research."
Gioele : What!? Can't you go 5 minutes without driving me insane? Well, it's too late now, my 2 little abominations are going to have to get married to themselves. Anyone got a blaster and a box? I might just do that minus the self pregnancy.

Eleesha : EXTRA EXTRA - HOT OFF THE PRESS!!! Humanities last hope... Doomed? Reports have come in from the last hope of humanity, also known as the Daedalicus Maximus, that there seem to be two mush onboard! Eyewitnesses say there are like "totes two yellow people in the crew bar, not cool man". Captain Jin Su was reached out to for comment, but seems to have barricaded himself in the dorms, communicating with the crew only via messenger birds. Stay tuned for more!
Janice : subscribes to the newsletter
Stephen : Birds? We have birds here now? The hell, why all the provision are wandering around that damn ship?! Are we like hipsters with all the "free range" food or something? I need all the supplies to be stored at the kitchen.

I also want to say that non even a single pigeon was hurt during the operation: Send a Message.

Jin Su : No comment in that topic.
Eleesha : she's sooooo his daughter
Eleesha : Disgraced Billionaire to be tarred and feathered? Eccentric Billionaire Gioele Rinaldo is coming under fire from crew members aboard the Daedalus. Reports suggest Mr. Rinaldo stands accused of misusing the budget to finance personal luxuries, neglecting to fund important things like metal walls and beds. Protesters have gathered outside the refectory, picketing with signs and angry peace chants. Security is nowhere to be seen, as these almost-riots increase in scale and passion.
Janice : she runs to Eleesha Eleesha, Eleesha! I am an experience Shrink. I believe I can do a mental health advice column in your newpapers. If you'd allow it?
Eleesha : Your hired! Your pay will be cupcakes and stale cigarettes, Talk to my secretary to get your badge and gun. I expect great things to be coming across my desk Janny. Great things!
Eleesha : COMMANDER JIN SU DECLARES WAR ON FUNGUS/STEPHEN KING ATTEMPTS TAKEOVER Beloved Commander Jin Su, also known as the Iron Blade of the Alpha Dorm!, was seen striking down one of the Daedalus's surprise mushrooms! Eyewitness reports say the battle raged for hours, as the shroom tried every trick at its disposal, but in the end it was no match for the brave Commander! Mr. Rinaldo, eyewitness, had this to say on the attacks "Get out of my face you tabloid...censored". Could this man be hiding something?
Eleesha : In other news, Stephen Seagull, resident stowaway, has declared himself King, and is attempting to seize control. We've reached out to Commander Jin Su, Iron Blade of Alpha Dorm for comment, but he reportedly was busy preparing the siege engines for battle.
Stephen : http://imgur.com/41yxfZR
A totally random guy wearing sunglasses, a huge scarf and totally not noticeable piece of beige duct tape over his non-existent mustache steps into the room.
Hello. I'm here to pick up all the copies of your magazine. I'll sell it, I'm your sales agent. Johnathan Smith Jin Soo, that's my name. Gimme your papers!
Eleesha : Hmm.... I'm gonna need some form of payment!
Jin Su : Khem... Yes.
Who is in charge of bringing up those nicknames? I think they need to have a small talk with our shrink. Few more words like this and I will have problem with too big ego.

Janice : Advice, Love and Life Long Dream. Hello everyone and welcome to my very own journalistic life advice column in Eleesha's newspapers. Here you submit your questions and I, being an expert in everything. Will answer them. Today's question is asked by Huamp-kin Piegirl: "If I extract a spore in front of someone, will they think it's gross?" My answer is yes. That's not only gross, but disturbing. You should do that stuff in private and in your own time. Not in public. That's all for today folks. Come back tomorrow where I will answer another question.
Eleesha : ... Not bad kid, not bad.
Everyone be sure to submit your questions to our expert!
Janice : I got a big one, Lee. Wait for tomorrows advice.

[9312471]

We're 11 survivors. To let you understanding, I've wroten english translations below, in spoilers, but yes, it's in french.

"The French invasion or How a small sentence shows you aren't alone !" 4 Traxs de 10 hp - 7 Hunters de 6 hp

[Tu es franais ? C'est pour cela que tu ne l'ouvres pas beaucoup depuis tout ce temps ?]
[Are you french ? That's why you don't speak a lot for these days ? [ Hey, il y a aussi des franais bavards soeurette ! (J'avais d'ailleurs mme pas fait attention que son message tait en franais.) ]
[Hey sister, there are too talkative french people ! (I didn't pay attention that his writting was in french)] [Je ne dis pas le contraire ! 213 messages... je ne me sens pas concerne par le "bavard" [...] On stoppe et on passe en priv, ds que j'aurais libr un canal ?]
[I don't say otherwise ! With 213 messages... I don't feel "talkative" is anything to do with me
[...] Can we stop and go in a private channel, when one of mine will be free ?] [ Yep, sinon ils vont nous gronder. ]
[You're right, otherwise they'll tell us off] ((Je gronde Paola.))
((I tell Paola off.)) [Hahaha ! La bonne blague s'il ne reste que des francophones parmi les survivants !]
[Hahaha ! Would be a joke if there are only French speakers left among survivors] [ Tsss, c'est malin... x) ] [Tsss, well done... ! x) ] [a vient scanner ou bien ?! ] [Are you going to scan or not ?! ] [ la prochaine fois je me tais, promis ! Au prochain(e), on sera la majorit et on pourra faire un putsch ]
[ Next time, I keep silent, I promise ! Next French people, we'll be in the majority and able to set up a putsch ] [Combien de personnes ne parlent pas fr ici.. ? je crois qu'on est dj plus de la majorit ]
[How many people don't speak French here ? I believe that we're more than the majority ] [ Bon... On s'organise pour le putsch ? ]
[So... How do we get organized for the putsch ?] Confirmed: French speakers survive longer than English speakers. You sneaky devils!

We're 11 survivors. To let you understanding, I've wroten english translations below, in spoilers, but yes, it's in french.

"The French invasion or How a small sentence shows you aren't alone !" 4 Traxs de 10 hp - 7 Hunters de 6 hp

[Tu es franais ? C'est pour cela que tu ne l'ouvres pas beaucoup depuis tout ce temps ?]
[Are you french ? That's why you don't speak a lot for these days ? [ Hey, il y a aussi des franais bavards soeurette ! (J'avais d'ailleurs mme pas fait attention que son message tait en franais.) ]
[Hey sister, there are too talkative french people ! (I didn't pay attention that his writting was in french)] [Je ne dis pas le contraire ! 213 messages... je ne me sens pas concerne par le "bavard" [...] On stoppe et on passe en priv, ds que j'aurais libr un canal ?]
[I don't say otherwise ! With 213 messages... I don't feel "talkative" is anything to do with me
[...] Can we stop and go in a private channel, when one of mine will be free ?] [ Yep, sinon ils vont nous gronder. ]
[You're right, otherwise they'll tell us off] ((Je gronde Paola.))
((I tell Paola off.)) [Hahaha ! La bonne blague s'il ne reste que des francophones parmi les survivants !]
[Hahaha ! Would be a joke if there are only French speakers left among survivors] [ Tsss, c'est malin... x) ] [Tsss, well done... ! x) ] [a vient scanner ou bien ?! ] [Are you going to scan or not ?! ] [ la prochaine fois je me tais, promis ! Au prochain(e), on sera la majorit et on pourra faire un putsch ]
[ Next time, I keep silent, I promise ! Next French people, we'll be in the majority and able to set up a putsch ] [Combien de personnes ne parlent pas fr ici.. ? je crois qu'on est dj plus de la majorit ]
[How many people don't speak French here ? I believe that we're more than the majority ] [ Bon... On s'organise pour le putsch ? ]
[So... How do we get organized for the putsch ?] Confirmed: French speakers survive longer than English speakers. You sneaky devils!

On july 7, 2016
Enigma

Whilst searching for the final starmap fragment the expedition pilot, Roland, became lost planet side; Hua launched a rescue mission to find her fellow pilot but after finding him she didn't come back with the ship, forcing the normally formal and restrained commander to launch a second search and rescue mission a couple of cycles later to find her.

It turned out she didn't want to be found...


: The emergency thermos of coffee has been consumed, we're coming for you Hua!

: It is too late. I am now one with the land. The rocks and trees will be my new brothers and sisters. The strange alien tubers grow by my command; I am content.

: Did I ask if you were content? No, no I did not. You still have a job to do and I've just chugged an entire thermos of coffee so you're coming back with us whether you like it or not woman!

: The aliens didn't have the fragment, our last chance on this planet is the shipwreck but otherwise we're back on the hunt. Be ready to scan Freida as soon as we retrieve this rebellious pumpkin of a pilot...

: we want you back hua you can't resist us

: The shipwreck and the surrounding crash site were empty, our journey isn't over yet.

: There you are... Get out of that bush this instant!

: Nooo! My rocks, my trees!

Mais pourquoi est-il aussi mchant ?

I think that someone used some strange gas in the cryo module.

Roland :
I think we need to build the workshop first, and then we all should go out and scavenge.

Jin Su :
Excuse me, but... what?

Roland :
The workshop. We need to get it done before the zeds come! Can you close the gates tonight? I have a bruised shoulder

Jin Su :
Ah. Of course, what was I thinking? We are going to be attacked by a horde of zombies. Sure.

Roland :
Yes. Are we 40 residents already?

Roland :
MUSH SAMPLE

Roland :
REAR ALPHA TURRET. RALUCA THERE.

Roland :
Taking Mushy mush buggy sample to lab. Raluca too quiet. Roland don't like Raluca quiet with mush sample. Hum

Jin Su :
Jin Su don't like non-confirmed people entering Raluca's turret.

Roland :
Roland don't like mush sample there.

Jin Su :
Jin Su don't like mush sample there either, but Jin Su don't like people being spiked.

Roland :
Mush sample lab. Need camera to watch mushy buggy sample.

Roland :
Roland don't spike Raluca. Raluca too quiet with mush sample. Roland doing work.

Ian :
Ian don't like pineapples. Especially on pizzas.

Roland :
Hmm...pizza.

Jin Su :
Oh my. Pizza with pineapple, onion and chorizo.

Roland :
Cho-ri-zo? CHO_RI_ZO? chorizo! Hongo Yongorizo

Jin Su :
Have you been drinking too?

Roland :
Bruised shoulder. Big pain.

Jin Su :
You have an injured shoulder and you haven't healed it?

Roland :
Roland pilot. Roland no doctor.

Jin Su :
We have no doctor, you have to do surgery yourself.

Roland :
WHAT?

Roland :
Ian hippie doctor. He fix me.

Stephen :
Maybe that green nurse-lady in the lab could help walk you through it. In case you mess up, I mean.

Roland :
2 ap. Roland kill hunters, find mush sample, bring pium-pium to Icarus ship. Roland tired.

Roland :
HAHA I like your moustacho Stephen.

Jin Su :
I know, you are tired right now, but you have to heal that shoulder as soon as you are rested enough.

Roland :
Heal shoulder, then pium-pium?

Ian :
I'm not a doctor. I can't heal you. Except if you're zucchini in disguise.

Roland :
You give me magic medicine. You know what I mean.

Jin Su :
Yes, heal shoulder and then pew pew hunters. But no magic medicine. Glares at Ian.

Ian :
Oh. You mean the "special" medicine. I see what you're talking about. I can give you what you want. Meet me in the lab, when everyone is asleep.

Ian :
Oh... I mean I don't know what you're talking about. Wink at Roland

Roland :
heheheh. Ian's plant are awesome.

Jin Su :
I said NO MAGIC MEDICINE, or Roland is going to see talking chorizo.

Ian :
It could be interesting to see talking chorizo speaking to talking pumpkin. I wonder what they could talk about.

Roland :
hehe. Okay """no magic medicine """ blinks at Ian twice

I would like to come with you but... I can't.

Ian :

Ian :
I was speaking to Chun, not the stranger.

Jin Su :
We need the blasters, in case those cows are angry. As for the sample, it's a brownish thing that looks like an octopus, with tentacles and all.

Chun :
my .. my body ???

Jin Su :
You will not study anyone's body until you have proven that you're sober, Mr Soulton.

Ian :
Don't worry, I'll just examine it. Maybe take a few samples of your cells but I swear I won't hurt you. cross his fingers

Chun :
I'm not a lab rat !

Ian :
I swear I'm sober. I could explain you how neurotransmitters travel in the brain and allow neurons to communicate. I'm sober but... whisper The talking pumpkin is with us... in the bay.

Hua :
She is here, mister Soulton ? Looks around Where? I hoped to meet it.

Jin Su :
I see no pumpkin here, talking or otherwise. If you are sober, then I worry about cryo damage.

Ian :
She is... hum... she is gone ! She was there a minute ago. But when you spoke, she diseappeared. Weird.

Jin Su :
We have just visited a very deserted desert. How boring.

Ian :
It's not just a desert. It's an arid land. Water is gone. Plants are gone. Life is gone. What's left ? Us, wondering in this desertic landscape. You need to think more deeply.

Jin Su :
Yeah, yeah. Empty land, no plants, no animals, not even a small bug. Whatever you say, it's boring.

Stephen :
Hm, hiking toward a distant horizon in a barren wasteland is oddly meditative, though... Stephen speaks with a strange lilt, seeming half in a trance...

Roland :
Souvenir Roland wants.

Jin Su :
We can bring you back Ian's frozen toe...

Ian :
The stranger understood what I'm talking about. It's not boring if you think.

Ian :
Leave my toe alone. I'll warm it in the microwave.

Pizza with stranger

I joing you now. I wanna see empty boring desert.

It's sliced tomato, not onion, silly... or zucchini is a nice touch.

The headline and other line on a BBC website says:

When will people learn that fruit on pizza is a terrible idea?
And we thought pineapple was bad

and continues

The latest abomination to grace our plates is banana pizza, which is apparently a standard menu item in Sweden. Bleurgh.

One of the most popular banana pizzas in the Scandinavian country is called 'the Afrikana', which has banana, peanuts, mushrooms and curry powder on it - and occasionally, even (brace yourselves) pineapple.

Planets :
Mantiide (10 cases)
North - 4
Ruminants, Insects x 2, Intelligent Life, Caverns, Strong Winds, Forest, Orchards, Oceanic, Low Temperatures

I found a better planet on east. It's Fromelode. This is a desert planet, we might visit the desert up to 4 times. Afforestation there is twice as dense and those are not out of insects. I want to send you there because behind the ocean, behind the mountain there are 3 campsites lived by intelligent life and ancient ruins to explore. Beware the treacherous swamps: those are lived by predators. Also hold your items tightly, otherwise the strong winds there may disperse them. 5 units of fuel are needed to load, but don't worry - there are some deposits to get it back.

If we will survive this expedition, i am not going anymore to stephens planets without normal list of zones cry
